newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentina to auction Letes T-bills May 13.
newsitem.headline: Argentina to auction Letes T-bills May 13.

text.p: Argentina will auction $250 million of 182- and 250 million pesos of 91-day Letes Treasury bills at its monthly bill auction May 13, the Economy Ministry said Thursday.
An official at the ministry said these issues will replace other bills that are maturing, leaving the stock of Letes in circulation unchanged.
The sale will take place through Dutch-style auction. Settlement will be on May 16.
Offers are due by 1400 local/1700 GMT.
